macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Supreme Court Strikes Down Trump Tariffs Under IEEPA
items.summary: The US Supreme Court ruled that tariffs imposed by President Trump under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) were unlawful, prompting Trump to announce a new global 10% tariff plus alternatives under other legislation. Markets showed limited reaction amid uncertainty over exemptions and next steps.[1][2]

items.title: US Q4 GDP Growth at 1.4%, Below Expectations
items.summary: US fourth-quarter GDP grew by 1.4%, significantly missing expectations of 2.5% according to Dow Jones survey. This data was absorbed alongside tariff news with muted market response.[2]

items.title: Fed Rate Cut Expectations Point to June
items.summary: Markets continue to price in the first Federal Reserve interest rate cut of the year for June, per CME Group FedWatch tool, amid ongoing inflation above 2% target and positive output gap.[1][2]

items.title: QQQM Nasdaq 100 ETF Climbs to $250.67
items.summary: Invesco Nasdaq 100 ETF (QQQM) rose to $250.67 on February 20 with high volume of 6.4 million shares; it has outperformed the market in the last 2 weeks (+2.0% vs SPY +1.7%) but underperformed yearly (+13.4% vs SPY +13.7%).[3]

items.title: US Stock Market Up 16% Since Election Despite Tariff Uncertainty
items.summary: US stocks are up 16% net since the election, rebounding post-Inauguration, but have underperformed most global indices in local terms except France's CAC40; China indices have matched or outperformed amid trade tensions.[1]

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Price Flashes Major Crash Warning Amid Bearish Signals
items.summary: Bitcoin has rebounded over 4% to above $68,200 but faces risks from a head-and-shoulders pattern, heavy supply clusters at $66,800 and $65,636, rising leverage, and five weeks of spot ETF outflows.

items.title: Crypto Hackers Drained $3.4 Billion from Blockchain in 2025, Sparking AI Security Push
items.summary: Hackers stole $3.4 billion in 2025, with three breaches causing 70% of losses; DeepSnitch AI, with 169% presale gains, deploys AI agents to combat this, positioning it as a high-potential project.

items.title: Grayscale Files for Spot TAO ETF Amid Bittensor Network Expansion Plans
items.summary: Grayscale filed for a spot TAO ETF, potentially unlocking institutional capital; Bittensor plans to double subnet capacity to 256 AI markets in 2026, with price targets from $200 to $800.

items.title: Bitcoin Activity Resilient Despite Rising Tariffs and Persistent ETF Outflows
items.summary: Bitcoin holds at $68,397 with +1.16% gain as activity persists amid tariff increases and ongoing ETF outflows, suggesting market repricing of risk.

items.title: Worldcoin (WLD) Trends with Institutional Backing and 2026 Price Forecasts
items.summary: Worldcoin trades at $0.37 after drop from $11.74 high, backed by a16z and Coinbase Ventures; 2026 predictions range from $0.60 to $9.50 based on proof-of-human adoption.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Generative AI Outpaces Human Teams in Analyzing Medical Data for Preterm Birth Prediction
items.summary: Scientists at UC San Francisco and Wayne State University found that generative AI processed massive medical datasets faster than human teams, generating usable prediction models in minutes for preterm birth risks using DREAM challenge data. Only 4 of 8 AI chatbots succeeded, but they matched or exceeded human performance, highlighting AI's potential in health research with human oversight.

items.title: India's SVAN-M2 Robot Dog Showcases at AI Impact Summit 2026 After Early Controversy
items.summary: The Indian-made SVAN-M2 robot, developed by xTerra Robotics from IIT Kanpur, impressed at the AI Impact Summit (Feb 16-20, 2026) with LiDAR-based 3D mapping for hazardous inspections, security, and thermal imaging, positioning it as cost-competitive with Chinese counterparts.

items.title: Tesla Expands AI Operations in India with Key Hardware Engineer and HPC Hiring
items.summary: Tesla is recruiting an AI Hardware Engineer and High-Performance Computing Infrastructure Engineer in India to develop custom AI chips for Full Self-Driving, Optimus robot, and Dojo supercomputer, signaling potential establishment of an AI R&D center shortly after launching vehicle sales.

items.title: Edge AI in Smart Grids Market to Surge 25.7% to $19.46 Billion in 2026
items.summary: The edge AI smart grids market is projected to grow from $15.49 billion in 2025 to $19.46 billion in 2026, driven by renewable integration, smart meters, IoT, predictive analytics, and cybersecurity needs for real-time energy management.

items.title: $1 Billion CEO Warns Coders and Software Engineers Face AI Job Disruption Within 18 Months
items.summary: AI executive Matt Gopal predicts 'baby AGI' for coding will automate software engineering jobs soon, citing revised 2025 job gains and rising productivity; he urges workers to adapt as AI excels at business-to-code translation, impacting SaaS, insurance, and customer service.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Xbox Boss Phil Spencer Retires; Microsoft Reshuffles Gaming Leadership
items.summary: Microsoft announced the retirement of Phil Spencer after 38 years at the company, including 12 years leading Xbox. Asha Sharma, former Instacart COO, will become head of Microsoft Gaming, while Matt Booty takes on executive vice president and chief content officer roles. Xbox president Sarah Bond is also departing the company.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
